original_title: 輪姦計画 受付嬢編 紺野ひかる
overview: Until you get tired! If you get tired of it, make it a toy! Heinous! I kidnapped a woman I wanted to fuck! As Desire Goes, I Will Endlessly Circle A Good Woman! ... The target this time is a receptionist of a certain famous company. In order for her to protect herself, she had no choice but to obey the men...
title: Gang Bang Plan Receptionist Edition Hikaru Konno
